text: Kiyamatara jnana kerala allahara ocarate'i pratyarartita haya. Te'omra ajnatasarata kono phalo araranara paraa ola'i nahe, kono narai'o garbha dharana nakarae arau santano prasara nakarae. Yidina allahe sihamtaka mati ka’ba, ‘mora ansidarasakala ka’ta’? Tetiya sihamte ka’ba, ‘ami tomara ocarata nibedana karao ye, e'i bisaye amara majata kono saksi na'i’
